DOC.brief_summary: The pulmonary veins are the predominant sources of AF induction and maintenance. This study aims to assess the electrophysiological properties of the pulmonary veins and their relation to AF in humans.
DOC.brief_title: Electrophysiological Properties of the Pulmonary Veins
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 years No antiarrhythmic drug treatment Indication for an electrophysiological study Structural heart diseases
